name: Beverage Belt
description:
Beverage Belt is an Oculus Rift and Rift S game in which the player is tasked with sorting recyclable beverage containers into their respective disposal bins! The containers are brought to the player on a conveyor belt that stops under absolutely no favourable circumstances. And while the bins may not be fully sentient, they certainly won't accept improperly prepared recyclables, so make sure you remove those pop tabs and bottle caps before adding to the pile!

Test your dexterity and efficiency in the following five modes:

Training (toggle the container spawn rate and belt speed until you find your sweetspot!)

Classic (earn as much money as you can before you make three mistakes!)

Survival (same mechanics as Classic, but one mistake and you're done!)

Precision (handle 100 beverage containers and aim for perfection?)

Frenzy (can you handle the onslaught for 2 minutes?)
